import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Container, Table, Button } from "react-bootstrap" import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import Workout from "../components/Workout" import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { listWorkouts } from '../actions/workoutActions' import Loader from "../components/Loader" import Message from "../components/Message" import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; const WorkoutListScreen = ({history}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const workoutList = useSelector((state) => state.workoutList) const { loading, error, workouts } = workoutList useEffect(() => { dispatch(listWorkouts()) }, [dispatch]) const deleteHandler = () => { console.log("delete") } return ( ( <>

Workout List

{loading ? : error ? {error} : ( <> {workouts.map(workout => )}
ID DESCRIPTION PRICE DATE
{workout._id} {workout.description} {workout.revenuePerClient} {workout.date}
)} )) } export default withRouter(WorkoutListScreen)
